text: You guys should open a Canadian office :flag-ca:

Hi All! I'm the CEO & Founder at Osano, a popular data privacy platform used by more than 3.5 million websites. You've probably seen one our open source products, Cookie Consent. If you've ever seen a cookie popup on a website that says "Got It" on the button, that's ours.

We are hiring a Remote Growth Engineer! Osano is fully remote, venture backed, growing like crazy, and addressing the massive data privacy industry. We are *heavily* built on top of HubSpot using CMS, CRM, Service, Custom Objects, and usually are early adopters in beta of the new HubSpot tools. Check out the company at <https://www.osano.com>

The Growth Engineer is a hybrid role that would report to our marketing leader working in the CMS coding templates, optimizing pages for speed and performance, working with marketing to configure A/B tests and then even helping to analyze and come up with new experiments to run. So the perfect candidate has strong experience as a HubSpot developer with a lot of interest and some experience in the marketing side of things.

If you or anyone you know is interested, please:

1. Learn about what it means to work at Osano. <https://www.osano.com/company/careers>
2. Apply for the role at <https://careers.osano.com/jobs/FlRPfmx68Fre>
3. DM me to tell me you applied so I can make sure you move to the top of the stack of resumes.
I hope to hear from you and happy to answer any questions.

*** NOTE - THIS ROLE IS ONLY AVAILABLE TO US RESIDENTS DUE TO TIME ZONE REQUIREMENTS ***
<@U01E3692GUF> Love the look and feel of the brand and website! :+1:
